title: Workload-Based Performance Tuning in Database Management Systems through Integration of Artificial Intelligence
abstract: Traditional methods of performance tuning in Database Management Systems (DBMS) are facing significant challenges in adapting to the dynamic nature of modern workloads. This paper proposes a novel approach for workload-based performance tuning through the integration of Artificial Intelligence (AI), leveraging machine learning and predictive modeling to automate workload analysis and dynamically adjust DBMS configurations for optimal performance.
journal: International Journal of Innovative Science and Research Technology (IJISRT)
